alert.note: Alert for Fort Bend; Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 2:05PM CST until further notice by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Cypress Creek Near Sharp Road affecting Harris and Fort Bend Counties. For the Cypress Creek...including Eldridge Parkway, Mathis Road, Sharp Road, Katy-Hockley Road, Hufmeister Road, Grant Road, Kohrville, Stuebner-Airline Road, Westfield, Kuykendahl Road, Inverness Forest, Cypresswood Drive...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cypress Creek near Sharp Road. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:50 PM CST Friday the stage was 164.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 164.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:50 PM CST Friday was 164.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to hold steady or rise only slowly until late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 164.2 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 164.9 feet on 06/09/2001. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Cypress Creek Sharp Road 164.2 164.5 Fri 1 pm CST MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 815 AM CST.
